scripts.build:network: docker network inspect jupyterhub-network >/dev/null 2>&1 || docker network create jupyterhub-network
scripts.build:notebook: sh -ac '. ./.env; docker build -t jupyterhub-user --build-arg JUPYTERHUB_VERSION=$JUPYTERHUB_VERSION --build-arg DOCKER_NOTEBOOK_IMAGE=$DOCKER_NOTEBOOK_IMAGE --build-arg KG_URL=$KG_URL --build-arg KG_AUTH_TOKEN=$KG_AUTH_TOKEN run/notebook'
scripts.build: npm run build:network && npm run build:notebook && npm run build:jupyterhub
